caption: (Translated by Google) Poor service  (Original) 服务差劲
服务真差 叫他们加汤 一男的服务员过来 好像很不情愿的样子 加完我们还想要点别的 服务员转身就走 本来不想给基础小费  但是他们强制性收你15%   小费多少无所谓  就是服务态度很差  ！！

Nice place. I believe they have the authentic Sichuan hot pot here. Now they have AYCE and it's a pretty good deal. Food's always delicious. Service is nice. I like how they keep everything clean here. I dined here twice since the pandemic started and both were great experience. Note to myself: don't drink too much soda at an AYCE. That's how they get you.

Omg the bear is so cute! It was very spicy though. We sat indoor and the table was pretty far apart. There were outside seating too. The meat were fresh and came with plastic box with cover. So we felt that the environment was hygienic. It was our first time going to this restaurant, the waitress explained to us what to do. She was really helpful. When you go, try the vegetable oil, it was so good.

I called on Feb 11 to confirm with them and they told me they’re opening the Brooklyn location on Feb 12 and that makes sense coz indoor dining open on Feb 12 and then I made a reservation online and got confirmed. I took one hour train to get here and they are closed!

The four of us went to eat hot pot at 9:15. I specifically asked what time the door closed. The waiter told us that the latest time was 10:30. so we ordered the food and quickly finished the meal until 10:40. There were also other table guests leave and We are also going to leave. a male waiter come  to tell us directly that can we take away the food. I said we almost left just give us 5mins,the male waiter go and turn off all the lights. It was very rude. We Will never come back to a place forgotten by God ! GO Somewhere else !!

(Translated by Google) A strong complaint. On November 11th, some of our friends ate hot pot here. After ordering a few dishes, everyone added the skewers to the buffet. After eating halfway, they felt that some of the skewers were rotten, and some may be Because of the spicy soup base, I didn’t eat it The freshness of the food, I just complained that the food here was not good while eating. The next day, my friend and I left New York very early, and my friends started to have diarrhea along the way. I also had stomach pains all day long, so I advise my relatives and friends not to Go here for hot pot.  (Original) 强烈投诉，11月11号我们朋友几个在这里吃火锅，点了几盘食物后，每个人又加了串串自助，吃到一半才感觉串串有的都已经馊了，有的可能是因为麻辣汤底的原因，没有吃出 食物的新鲜度，只是一边吃一边埋怨这里的东西不好吃，第二天我和朋友很早离开纽约，一路上朋友就开始拉肚子，我也一整天胃胀疼痛，建议自己的亲人朋友不要去这吃火锅。
(Translated by Google) It's so delicious, it's a bit expensive  (Original) 实在太好吃呢 东西有点贵的
Worse customer service
(Translated by Google) Feel uncomfortable eating outside  (Original) 在外面吃感觉不舒服
Service is ok.  Price for all you can eat is ok but selection is terrible.  Price for a bottle of Corona is $9.  This is Sunset Park; other restaurants charges half that price.
good
Normal chinese hotpot
Best hot pot ever!
(Translated by Google) Now the price is so expensive, the food is getting less and less, and nothing is so expensive for more than 200  (Original) 现在价格好贵，东西也越来越少了，没吃什么菜都那么贵200多
Food was amazing, very kind servers. Would definitely go again when I can.

(Translated by Google) In fact, it tastes good, and it is not deliberately difficult. My friend and I passed by 9 o'clock tonight, and there was no place at the time.. I asked it may be until 9:30.. We passed by 10 o'clock.. Waited for a long time. We will sit down at 10:40.. Because we want to eat fast and not affect others at about the end of work time. The soup will come out at about 10:55.. The Qitai that serves us tonight also knows.. We will I didn’t boil it when I ate it. Some were eaten before it boiled. We also knew it was too late. I can eat it quickly! In fact, you can choose not to pick up the shop when the time is up. There is an odd table to see if we haven’t boiled. Just come and help us take it in and burn it. It hasn’t been taken out for a few minutes. Another odd table came over and said sorry to me We are closed here, and we will give you another 5 minutes. Since you chose to take the order so late, you shouldn’t be like that. It was 11.50 minutes at that time. In fact, we knew it was late and talked to another strange station. Say. Sorry! We also work in the service industry.. My wife also specifically said that we try to finish eating as soon as possible. . Hearing what this Qitai said, I couldn't eat it when I was so angry! It’s the first time I spent a lot of money and didn’t eat enough after eating in New York for so long. That expression! 🔥I’ve never been so angry before. Money out for consumption. You and the guests’ attitude. If it’s really late, you don’t need to pick us up at the front desk. Come out at the soup base. To finish eating. One hour. You ask someone to rush Eat to die? I really want to scold people. But your attitude. You speak your voice.! Or don’t pick it up if it’s too late. Wouldn’t it be too much to drive others away after you pick it up? And it’s windy outside. It doesn’t boil all the time. It’s not that we don’t want to eat fast. Everything depends on the situation! It's too much! 🔥🔥🔥 will never go again!  (Original) 其实味道不错、也不是特意刁难.今晚我和朋友9点过去那时侯没位置..问了一下可能要到9点半..我们10点又过去..又等了蛮久的.到10点40分座下去..因为差不多下班时间我们也想吃快点不影响别人.到了差不多10:55分的时候汤底出来..今晚风大服务我们的奇台也知道..我们再吃的时候一直烧不开..有些没烧开就吃了.我们也知道太晚了.能快就快点吃！其实你们开店的时间到了时候可以选择不接的..有个奇台看我们还没烧开.就过来帮我们拿进去烧.还没拿出来几分钟.另一个奇台过来跟我说不好意思.我们这边关门了、再给你5分钟时间.既然你选择这么晚接单了.你就不应该这样.那个时候11.50分把.其实再这之前我们知道很晚了也跟另外一个奇台说.不好意思！我们自己也是做服务行业的..我老婆还特意说我们尽量早点吃完.。.听到这个奇台说的话被气的吃都吃不下！我再纽约吃这么久第一次花钱没吃饱.这个不是主要..那个奇台过来说话的态度.实在太过份了！那个表情！🔥重来没受这气过.钱拿出来消费.你跟客人这态度.如果真的晚了前台就不需要把我们接进去.到汤底出来.到吃完.一个小时.你叫人赶着吃去死吗？我真的很想骂人.但是你这个态度.你说话语气.！要么晚了就不要接了.接了你再赶别人走不会太过份了吗？而且外面风大.一直烧不开.不是我们不想吃快.凡事也要看个情况！真的太过份了、！🔥🔥🔥以后不会再去了！
very nice food and service. will definitely visit again
The bottom of the hot pot soup is delicious, that is, the consumption is slightly higher! You can come here for a treat! Beautiful environment!

They were super pleasant! I loved the staff and their suggestions. Also the food was out of this world. I don't know I read a few reviews and they made me super nervous but it was great. Definitely telling my friends to go here.
great food
Great atmosphere, really like the interior design. The food was delicious. They really mean it when it's spicy.

They have promotion recently ,  best spicy hotpot in Brooklyn so far , seat is cozy , service not best , take an hour wait to get my seat , but I'm not regret. Definitely going to come back next time !! Have a good time with my friend here 😊

(Translated by Google) This is the worst restaurant I've ever eaten in Brooklyn. Even if the food is expensive, the service is not good, the water is not added, the plates are not changed, and I have to do it myself. However, the result was canceled. The spoon dropped into the pot and it was urged twice before I changed it. A bunch of waiters walking around didn't add anything to you. Shouldn't the expensive items keep up with the service? Otherwise, why should people come to you for consumption and never go again.  (Original) 这是我吃过布碌仑觉得最差的店，东西贵就算了 服务还差，水都不添，盘子也不换，还要自己动手，海蚌催了一次又一次最终都没有给我上，结果还是取消了，勺子掉到锅里面，催了两次才给我换，一堆服务生在那走来走去就是不给你添东西，真是够坑的。东西卖的贵不应该跟上服务吗 不然人家凭什么来你这消费，再也不会去.
Delicious! Better than the flushing location.

This restaurant probably has one of the prettiest interior designs for a restaurant I have ever seen. I went during lunch and they were running a $50 special for 2-3 people which included 9 different veggies of your choosing, 3 types of meatballs, choice between beef, lamb, or both, and 3 types of seafood. The quality of food was excellent. I've been to many different hotpot spots and this one had possibly the best soup base I've ever had - I tried the house special spicy flavor.

I went there with couple of friends after 9:30pm for the special all-you-can-eat deal. There weren't many people there so there was no wait at all. The decor was nice, mimicking Chinese style. The service was slow, if at all. I love the soup base and the butter bear was cute. I feel like there weren't many vegetables options in the all you can eat selection. Each bamboo skewers had 1-2 pcs of food, extremely not environmentally friendly and wasteful of skewers. This place is good for group hangout as well.

The broth used is very good, I like the flavor and it's only a bit salty. The portion is alright but could be better for the price, the cuts of meat is decent quality. The review is three star mostly because my bill was 50 per person but I've eaten much better food for 50 dollars. Either the portion goes up or the price lowers a bit. Overall I think this location is okay, I don't think I'll return.
I like the food.
Very very nice place!!! Good service!! Very good delicious food!! The best!!

Beautiful decor, truly very cool. This place has a communal pot. The food is fresh and tasty. You really have to love Szechuan taste to come here, personally and after about 15 minutes the spicy red broth overwhelms the meat and whatever you put in there. The chicken collagen broth is ok, not life changing. I know how ma and la works. Szechuan just isn't my bag. It ain't cheap.
(Translated by Google) Not bad  (Original) 不错
A wonderful dining experience. NOTE: the spicy broth, even the least spicy, is damned hot. Noisy, loud. Go in a large group and ask for an alcove table.

I LOVE THIS PLACE! I've been twice in one month, and I typically don't eat at the same restaurant twice in six months to a year.  Beware, you MUST LOVE Spicy food in order to enjoy the spicy hot pot. TELL THEM MILD OR LOW Spice, or it will be too hot to enjoy. Trust Me!
Nice hotpot place, not as busy as flushing one so good place to go

Not worth the price,  the soup base is pretty good,  limited choices of foods,  over price and dipping sauce charge $2.99 for person,  give u free fruits but only orange and melon. If you come after 9:30pm,  they have special 19.99$ per person all u can eat,  I saw alot of people come and wait until 9:30pm.  4 of us $50 per person,  not full and not much selection for us to order.  This is first time for us need to go to other restaurant after this meal.  Sorry not my taste.

(Translated by Google) After 930 pm, I went to eat the string buffet, the price is very high, the taste is not particularly prominent, but it is also good (strong push the liver and duck tongue). Service and environment are also good. The biggest problem may be that there are too many people and replenishment is too slow. Every time I have to wait for the place where the ingredients are taken, some things are robbed and empty. The seasoning area was also not added in time. When I was seasoning, the garlic and parsley were empty. I hope that this aspect can be strengthened, even if the price is increased a little, but it can greatly enhance the customer's dining experience.  (Original) 晚上930之后去吃的串串自助，性价比很高，味道不算特别突出，但也不错（强推郡肝和鸭舌）。服务和环境也还不错。最大的问题可能是因为人太多，补货太慢。每次都要等在取食材的地方，有些东西一来就被一抢而空了。调料区也补充不及时，我做调料的时候蒜泥和香菜都空了。希望这方面能有所加强，哪怕价格提高一点，但是可以极大地提升客户的用餐体验。
(Translated by Google) There is a change of face between 9:30 and 10:00!  (Original) 9点半到10点之间有变脸可以看哦！
There was close to no service, i got my first plate changed 90 minutes into a all you can eat meal. Everything after that dodnt even matter anymore

(Translated by Google) It’s so delicious, I like the butter pot most, and the tomato pot is very tasty! The environment and service are also very good, just at noon discounts are more cost-effective. It is too far away, and there is still a distance to go out of the subway station. Otherwise I would love to eat it often.  (Original) 太好吃了，最喜欢牛油锅了，番茄锅也很入味哦！环境和服务也很好，正好中午打折优惠比较划算。就是太远了，出了地铁站还要走一段距离。不然我乐意经常来吃的。
9:30pm after ，all you can eat is very offordable and yummy
Highend Chinese hot pot restaurant. Great if you are fond of spicy dishes.
Best hot pot in Brooklyn. Nice service and great spicy soup base.
Very beautifully decorated and soothing atmosphere, enjoying my yummy tomato soup hot pot...😋
(Translated by Google) Decoration and service are very good! The food is also delicious  (Original) 装修跟服务都很好！食物也很好吃

(Translated by Google) Crazy to play Call for the Brooklyn store! The service is super good, much better than the Flushing store. Really responsive, the waiter from time to time to ask if there is any need, at the beginning will introduce how to eat dry dishes! $19.99 / bit Really cost-effective, duck tongue is super delicious! At first, I thought that a lot of expensive dishes would be finished soon, but the fragrant world would always make up the dishes. The supervisor Jason is also very Nice, and will have a table to ask the guests. Will come often~  (Original) 疯狂为布鲁克林店打Call！服务超级好，比法拉盛店好太多。真的是有求必应，服务员时不时的就来问一下是不是有什么需要，一开始还会介绍怎么吃干碟！$19.99 /位 真的太划算了，鸭舌超级好吃！一开始还以为很多贵的菜品会很快就被拿完，但香天下一直会补菜。主管Jason人也很Nice，还会一个个桌来问一下客人的意见。会常来的～

(Translated by Google) This shop is the best hot pot I have ever eaten. The most loved bamboo squid is my favorite. There is also the characteristic spicy butter. Amazing bear is very delicate and cute. It is suitable for me to eat spicy people! The elegant and retro style of the store and the exquisite display. The main thing is that the young lady in the store has a great service attitude! Must be 5 stars praise!  (Original) 这家店是我吃过的最好吃的火锅，最钟爱竹笙虾滑是我的最爱 还有就是特色麻辣牛油也是Amazing 小熊做得很精致很可爱 很适合我这种吃辣人群！店内环境优雅复古风 而且摆盘精致 最主要的是店里的小姐姐小哥哥服务态度很棒！ 必须5星好评！

(Translated by Google) Nice, I have eaten many times. Once I eat it, I fell in love with it. If you love spicy food, you must not miss his home! ! There are still self-service strings in the evening that are super cheap. His home's paprika is delicious and spicy. Every time it is essential. The younger brother and sister in the store are very good.  (Original) nice， 吃过好多次了 吃一次就爱上了☺️ ，爱吃辣的一定不能错过他家！！现在晚上还有自助串串超便宜的 。他家的辣椒粉又香又辣好吃.每次都必不可少的😄。店里面服务的小哥哥小姐姐都很好

(Translated by Google) As soon as you enter the store, you will see the lotus pond in the hall with a four-corner wooden pavilion. There is also a cheongsam beauty reception guest, the key is to have someone valet parking and free parking. With a box that can accommodate more than 12 Party rooms, the individual likes their spicy boiled pot at the bottom of the sprout (Nicholas ° Sao bear), this family's 🍺 every day before 9:30 per bottle price Not 1.99 is $0.99! The service brother will also carefully arrange the oil dish, and one of the traditional cultures of Sichuan will change face every evening! Tip: I don’t know how to eat the buttery hot pot. Remember to clear the bottom of the pan. (Translated by Google) The environment is good, the service is also very good, the soup base is awesome, it is the best hot pot restaurant in New York I have ever eaten!  (Original) 环境好，服务也很好，汤底更是棒棒哒，是我吃过的纽约最好的火锅店了！

(Translated by Google) Really like a store, the decoration style is very old-fashioned. It looks very good. The service is also very good. The price of the self-service string is very fair. The taste of the dry-disc powder is also very good. The a la carte menu is also very good. It deserves five-star praise.  (Original) 真的很赞一家店 装修风格很古风 看起来也很上档次   服务也很好 自助串串价格很公道 配的干碟粉味道也很好 单点菜品也很棒 值得五星好评 疯狂打卡

The soup base is excellent and service is very good. They also do a performance nightly and have an overall fun vibe.
(Translated by Google) Expensive stuff and poor service  (Original) 東西貴 服務差
Not worth to spend so much money to eat there.  Too little choices and we are surprised the we need to pay for the sauce.
Imo, the best hot pot place in nyc. It's far but worth it, because none in Manhattan can compare

Just click on something and be told that 1 o'clock in the kitchen to get off work at 1 o'clock and less than ask for a checkout. No, I won’t go back next time. I don’t recommend restaurant friends to go to work. I don’t have time to eat! ! ! ! Too pricey. Not good value. Difficult to find parking.
Good food and service
The service its bad and wait a long time for my appetizer besides nobody brought more water to my table
Very authentic Sichuan hotpot
(Translated by Google) It's over if it tastes good  (Original) 好吃就完事了

(Translated by Google) This shop is a liar. When you sell the card, you will not tell you the rules of using the card. When you pay the bill, tell you that the card cannot be used at this time. The membership card has not been discounted at this time. As a result, it is not easy to buy a card than to buy a card. Because you use cards to give more money. I can brush the cards they sold and the maximum number of credit cards. As a result, several of my cards have been removed several times. All prices are based on a discounted price plus a percentage tip, pit people. For example, 100 gives you a 15% discount. After you fold the tip, 15% is 15 and the bill is 85. That is 85. You have to give 15 tips. The waiter is not calling, and the bargaining fee is 3 yuan per person, but you have to wait for them to make up the fruit. This store is not far away  (Original) 这家店就是个骗子。卖卡充卡的时候不告诉你使用卡的规矩，等你买单了告诉你这卡不能这个时候用，会员卡还没这个时段打折多，结果你买了卡比没买卡还不好用，因为你用卡要给更多的钱。可以刷他们卖的卡了还有最高刷卡额度，结果我的几张卡去了几次还刷不完。 所有价格都是有个打折价的基础上加百分比小费，坑人。 比如100给你15%折扣，折完了小费是15%是15，账单最后是85.就是85的菜金你要给15小费。  服务员是不叫不来，调料吧每人收3元但你要等他们高兴了补点水果上去。这种店走不远

(Translated by Google) 45 pounds a pound, a pound of results will come up half a pound. More than 20 shrimps. This price and quantity are arrogant. I want to eat more than 300 meals here. I want to eat more than two hundred meals.  (Original) 45块一磅，点了一磅结果上来也就半磅。二十多只虾。这价格和量牛逼，在这里想吃饱的一顿300以上，想吃雅的一顿两百多就可以了

Pricey and low quality.
Service were excellent. Love the ambiance.. we got the dual pot soup base, very favorable.
(Translated by Google) I have to wait an hour to make an appointment, no credit, and a bad attitude.  (Original) 预约了时间还要等一个小时，没有信用，态度又差
Good food and good service

They just upgraded the soup base. When you order the spicy soup base, it comes with tofu, Duck blood and quail eggs. Taste great!  They also provide summer specials including beef, chicken neck, chicken feet, pigs ears seasoned with special sauce. All taste very delicious, better with beer!  Pros: Valet parking, no need to worry about the parking. Just park in front of the restaurant and someone will help you. No long waiting. If you remember, the Flushing location is always crowded especially during the weekend. This location is just about right. Not crowded but the food, service and flavor are the same great!!  Cons: Location is not very convenient for public transportation.

When you enter here, one can get lost in the warm and Asian themed atmosphere. It's an amazing feeling. The food is prepared fresh and the presentation is beautiful. Service is courteous. However, as with many restaurants, is understaffed. It took almost a half hour to have our order taken but overall, this is our favorite hot pot place and is much better than the more popular 99 Favor restaurant.

Xiang Hotpot has three core values: “Quality first”, “Customer first”, and “Healthy and happy”. 🤗 *TIPS* ♡ If you’re looking for a place that makes you feel like you’re in a completely different world, this is the place to be. Travel here by car instead without having to take a plane 😂👌 ♡  Great seated areas for groups! Very roomy. ♡  Don’t you dare pass up their bubble tea🙌 ♡  This place is incredibly Instagram worthy So have fun and get dressed up if you’re into photos❤️ ♡  If you want to impress your date I would take them here! ♡  The hot pot experience is entertaining and fun to do. Cook it however you like and then enjoy🙏 ♡  Never done this before? No problem! They are incredibly informative and will help you every step of the way to make sure you get the best taste and experience. ♡  Can’t forget the amazing performances they put on while you enjoy your food!🎉 ♡  If you’re looking for authentic they are the defnition of it👍🥰 ♡  Don’t worry I didn’t forget to mention the food is also incredible and we will definitely be back since they are located in Brooklyn and Flushing!
(Translated by Google) Write the chain, but Flushing's membership card can't be used to express it.....  (Original) 写的连锁的，但是法拉盛的会员卡居然不能用表示呵呵.....
Nice place!

Heard this is a relatively new place so we decided to try it out. They have a wide variety of food so you can pick them out and throw them in the pot. The staff is very receptive to any questions and are very helpful when we needed anything. The only minor problems were the prices are pretty high but the food is very good. And the drinks that some of the people ordered took a while to come out. However I recommend people try this place out.

The place is beautifully decorated with a classic Chinese style, giving the vibe of traditional village. The service was fantastic and attentive waiters and servers, they wore nice uniforms too. It was difficult choosing which soup base to go with but opted for the split broth with the Teddy Bear base. The food was high quality from all the dishes we ordered, although a bit pricier than most places but it's higher end overall. The menu is pretty extensive including bubble tea. I enjoyed all the delicious ingredients i ordered like the Black Tofu, which was a charcoal flavor, spicy marinated beef, a nice fatty thinly sliced beef, tripe and shrimp paste wrapped with mushroom.
High quality ingredients and attentive service
The decor is super nice, the ingredients are fresh, staff is super friendly. But the wait with a reservation is still a bit long.
Good food

Not all you can eat hotpot/BBQ. You pay by the dish and their dishes are on the pricey end imo. Came here with one other friend for dinner, bill came out to 200+ for almost the same amount of food we usually order at all you can eat hotpot. But to be fair we also ordered wagyu beef that was on the menu, think it's about $27 per plate but there were only like 5 or 6 thin slices per plate. Don't be fooled btw. Many of their meat dishes here come on a basket where theres ice on the bottom with the meat on top, to keep the meat fresh I guess. It gives a delusion that you are getting a lot of meat but you are really only getting several slices per dish. They do have a lot of variety here if you are looking for something more than your typical all you can eat hotpot. Besides the food, the interior is very nice. It looks like one of those restaurants that you find in the ancient times of China. Their waiter/waitress are also dressed up. When we went there was some sort of performance going on near the entrance of the restaurant where you can watch while you eat. Not sure if they always had performances or it was a special occasion. Overall food was okay but too pricey and the interior design is very nice.

Came here with my family for lunch. Our waitress was super friendly, and we were given a lot of options for food, many that I've never seen before. I really liked their shrimp paste with squid ink (not pictured cuz, let's be honest, anything with squid ink will look nasty). This place is perfect for groups. It came out to about $80 per person, and everyone left full.
come again
It was very funny and tasty!

The ambiance is great, service is OK but the food and drinks are super overpriced for the quality and quantity we get here. $60 per person and we left just 75% full. We are not huge eaters. The sauce is $2.99 per person, I had never been to a hotpot place that charge for sauce. Some superb hotpot all you can eat places around here taste way better only cost half of the price. Never again.

One of the few hotpot places that aren't all you can eat. As a result the food is definitely fresher and the presentation is a lot better. The interior is very clean and decorated very nicely as well in an old Chinese style. You'll definitely end up paying more for your meal compared to other hot pot restaurants, but I think it's well worth it.

Xiang Hot Pot has such a good atmosphere and the food is so amazing! It's definitely a great place for friends and family gatherings.

This is the best hot pot in town! I have been to their Flushing location but this is truly the best! This new location is the go to spot if you're trying to showcase the best hotpot experience to your friends!
